TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MulticastDelegate extends System.Delegate
Public MustInherit Class MulticastDelegate Inherits Delegate
public ref class MulticastDelegate abstract : Delegate

summary.span: 表示多路广播委托；即，其调用列表中可以拥有多个元素的委托。

span.span: Represents a multicast delegate; that is, a delegate that can have more than one element in its invocation list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个特殊的类。 is a special class. 编译器和其他工具可以派生自此类，但不能从它派生显式。Compilers and other tools can derive from this class, but you cannot derive from it explicitly. 这同样适用的类。The same is true of the class. 除了委托类型的方法继承，公共语言运行时提供两种特殊的方法：`BeginInvoke`和`EndInvoke`。In addition to the methods that delegate types inherit from , the common language runtime provides two special methods: `BeginInvoke` and `EndInvoke`. 有关这些方法的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information about these methods, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). A具有的委托，调用的调用列表，其中包含的一个或多个元素的链接的列表。A has a linked list of delegates, called an invocation list, consisting of one or more elements. 调用多路广播的委托时，调用列表中的委托是同步调用它们的出现顺序。When a multicast delegate is invoked, the delegates in the invocation list are called synchronously in the order in which they appear. 如果该列表的执行过程中发生错误将引发异常。If an error occurs during execution of the list then an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类`StringContainer`，其中包括一个字符串集合。The following example defines a class, `StringContainer`, which includes a collection of strings. 其成员之一是`CheckAndDisplayDelegate`委托，用于显示字符串存储在`StringContainer`满足特定条件的对象。One of its members is the `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegate, which is used to display strings stored in a `StringContainer` object that satisfy particular criteria. 委托采用单个字符串作为参数并返回`void`(或在 Visual Basic 中，它是`Sub`过程)。The delegate takes a single string as a parameter and returns `void` (or, in Visual Basic, it's a `Sub` procedure). 它还包括一种方法， `DisplayAllQualified`，具有单个参数，`CheckAndDisplayDelegate`委托。It also includes a method, `DisplayAllQualified`, that has a single parameter, a `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegate. 这使被调用的方法，并且根据委托中包含的方法来显示一组进行筛选的字符串。This allows the method to be called and to display a set of strings that are filtered based on the methods that the delegate contains. 该示例还定义了一个实用工具类`StringExtensions`，有两种方法：The example also defines a utility class, `StringExtensions`, that has two methods: - `ConStart`它会显示以辅音字母开头的字符串。`ConStart`, which displays strings that begin with a consonant. - `VowelStart`它会显示开头元音的字符串。`VowelStart`, which displays strings that begin with a vowel. 请注意，这两种方法包括单个字符串参数，并且返回`void`。Note that both methods include a single string parameter and return `void`. 换而言之，这两种方法可以分配给`CheckAndDisplayDelegate`委托。In other words, both methods can be assigned to the `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegate. `Test.Main`方法是应用程序入口点。The `Test.Main` method is the application entry point. 它实例化`StringContainer`对象，其中填充字符串，并创建两个`CheckAndDisplayDelegate`委托，`conStart`和`vowelStart`，调用单个方法。It instantiates a `StringContainer` object, populates it with strings, and creates two `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegates, `conStart` and `vowelStart`, that invoke a single method. 然后，它调用方法来创建`multipleDelegates`委托，它最初包含`ConStart`和`VowelStart`委托。It then calls the method to create the `multipleDelegates` delegate, which initially contains the `ConStart` and `VowelStart` delegates. 请注意，当`multipleDelegates`调用委托，它显示在其原始顺序集合中的所有字符串。Note that when the `multipleDelegates` delegate is invoked, it displays all the strings in the collection in their original order. 这是因为每个字母单独传递给每个委托，并且每个字母满足筛选条件的两个委托之一。This is because each letter is passed separately to each delegate, and each letter meets the filtering criteria of only one of the two delegates. 最后，在调用后和，`multipleDelegates`包含两个`conStart`委托。Finally, after calls to and , `multipleDelegates` contains two `conStart` delegates. 调用时，在每个字符串`StringContainer`两次显示对象。When it is invoked, each string in the `StringContainer` object is displayed twice. [!code-cpp[Multicast Delegate Introduction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Multicast Delegate Introduction/CPP/delegatestring.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Multicast Delegate Introduction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Multicast Delegate Introduction/CS/delegatestring.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Multicast Delegate Introduction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Multicast Delegate Introduction/VB/delegatestring.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不能在应用程序代码。This constructor cannot be used in application code. 若要通过指定实例方法的名称创建委托，使用的重载指定方法名称和目标对象的方法。To create a delegate by specifying the name of an instance method, use an overload of the method that specifies a method name and a target object. 例如，方法重载具有指定名称创建的实例方法的委托。For example, the method overload creates a delegate for an instance method with a specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不能在应用程序代码。This constructor cannot be used in application code. 若要通过指定静态方法的名称创建委托，使用的重载指定方法名称，但未指定目标对象的方法。To create a delegate by specifying the name of a static method, use an overload of the method that specifies a method name but does not specify a target object. 例如，方法重载具有指定名称创建静态委托方法。For example, the method overload creates a static delegate for a method with a specified name.

summary.span: 确定此多路广播委托和指定的对象是否相等。

span.span: Determines whether this multicast delegate and the specified object are equal.

returns.span: 如果 和此实例具有相同的调用列表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if and this instance have the same invocation lists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个委托是否相等，如果它们不`null`且的完全相同的类型，其调用列表中包含相同数量的元素，且第一个委托的调用列表中每个元素等于在调用中的相应元素第二个委托的列表。Two delegates are equal if they are not `null` and are of exactly the same type, their invocation lists contain the same number of elements, and every element in the invocation list of the first delegate is equal to the corresponding element in the invocation list of the second delegate. 如果它们调用的相同的目标实例上的同一实例方法或它们调用相同的静态方法，两个调用列表的元素相等。Two invocation list elements are equal if they invoke the same instance method on the same target instance, or they invoke the same static method.

summary.span: 按照调用顺序返回此多路广播委托的调用列表。

span.span: Returns the invocation list of this multicast delegate, in invocation order.

returns.span: 一个委托数组，这些委托的调用列表合起来与此实例的调用列表一致。

span.span: An array of delegates whose invocation lists collectively match the invocation list of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该数组包含一组的代理，而每个都有一个条目的调用列表。The array contains a set of delegates, each with an invocation list of one entry. 按顺序，该数组中显示的顺序调用这些委托生成与调用当前实例相同的结果。Invoking these delegates sequentially, in the order they appear in the array, produces the same results as invoking the current instance.

span.span: if and have the same invocation lists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个委托是否相等，如果它们不`null`且的完全相同的类型，其调用列表中包含相同数量的元素，且第一个委托的调用列表中每个元素等于在调用中的相应元素第二个委托的列表。Two delegates are equal if they are not `null` and are of exactly the same type, their invocation lists contain the same number of elements, and every element in the invocation list of the first delegate is equal to the corresponding element in the invocation list of the second delegate. 如果它们调用的相同的目标实例上的同一实例方法或它们调用相同的静态方法，两个调用列表的元素相等。Two invocation list elements are equal if they invoke the same instance method on the same target instance, or they invoke the same static method. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is
